search_results.title: Bklava
search_results.snippet: Lara Sweeney aka London-based producer, DJ and vocalist Bklava has been dishing out irresistible anthems for buzzing dancefloors since 2019.

search_results.title: Multi-Hyphenate Music Maker Bklava on Their Journey to ...
search_results.snippet: Bklava's star is rising. The South London native is a multi-hyphenate doer, wearing hats as a vocalist, producer and DJ.

search_results.title: Artist of the Month: Bklava
search_results.snippet: We chronicle the incredible rise of Bklava, one of the UK's most exciting young acts and Beatport's Artist of the Month.
